entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
